description: Stores processed, quality-checked data ready for analysis and visualization. This data has undergone comprehensive quality assurance and quality control (QAQC) processing through the auto-QAQC pipeline.
purpose: Provide clean, flagged, and analysis-ready water quality data for scientific analysis, reporting, and visualization

qaqc_levels: Single-parameter flags (drift, noise, repeating values, spec violations)
Inter-parameter flags (frozen conditions, burial, unsubmerged sensors)
Network-level flags (cross-site comparisons, suspect data identification)
processing_steps: Data standardization and temporal aggregation to 15-minute intervals
Integration with field notes and maintenance records

subfolders.name: HydroVu
subfolders.description: Processed HydroVu sensor data with QAQC flags applied

data_columns.name: mean
data_columns.description: Average value for the 15-minute time interval

data_columns.name: n_obs
data_columns.description: Number of observations in the 15-minute interval

data_columns.name: spread
data_columns.description: Measure of data variability in the 15-minute interval

data_columns.name: mal_flag
data_columns.description: Manual malfunction flag (based on field notes)

data_columns.name: sonde_moved
data_columns.description: Indicator of whether sonde was shifted in housing or up/downstream

retention_policy.description: Complete datasets archived with version control, visualization datasets updated daily

quality_control.validation: automated flagging system with manual review capability
